name: Spellcasting
effects: cantrips: know wizard cantrips as shown on the class table
prepared spells: at level 1, prepare four level 1+ spells from your spellbook
prepared spells: total prepared spells are shown on the class table; always-prepared wizard spells donaTMt count against this number
spell slots: per class table; regain all expended slots on a long rest
spellcasting focus: you can use an Arcane Focus or your spellbook
limits: cantrip swap: replace one cantrip when you finish a long rest
prepared spell swap: on a long rest, replace prepared spells with other spells from your spellbook
prepared spells must be of a level for which you have spell slots
notes: See chapter 7 for general spellcasting rules and the Wizard spell list in this chapter.
